review:
The doctor asked me to get an MRI done for Left Hip and suggested a Diagnostic center. I told him that this particular diagnostic center is charging double the price than the regular diagnostic center and i want to get my MRI done at more economical place. But he insisted that we get it done at the place he suggested. I never went back to the doctor.
Also in the beginning itself he said MRI is required, *** ***** ** *** ** ***** **** ****** *** *** ** *** ***** ******* *** ********* ** *** ********* * ********* **** **** **** *** *** ********** ** ***** ***** ** *** ********* **** *** ********** *******

I consulted Mr.Prasad for knee pain , his way of diagnosing was excellent. His way of talking with patients will ease half of the pain. The only thing I felt bad was price of xray and physiotherapy was too high in ragi clinic
